Articles.Content:
We need a mod which adds waits, loops and other programming things to action groups.

Or a mod which links ksp to external programming like python.
There's SmartParts, kOS, RemoteTech and some VPL project.

Something like kOS, but bound to action groups? http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68089-0-23-kOS-Scriptable-Autopilot-System-v0-11-2-13

I imagine this could be done if kOS has compatibility with turning itself on/off using action groups, but I haven't used it before.
